name: Space Jelly Factory
description:
Keep the alien alive while managing the jelly factory!

Controls:

  • Left click: Attract jellies
  • Right click: Repulse jellies

Objectives:

  • Make jellies lines
  • Keep the alien alive
  • Kill the evil robots

Credits:

  • Marion Maignan: Programmer
  • Antoine "Taldius" Semblat: Game designer, artist and programmer
  • Aurélien Montero: Composer and sound designer

Special thanks:

  • Audrey Delorme for the 2 posters in the background

Known issues:

  • Sometime a cube can fall on the alien
